channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Is US looking to scrap the H-1B visa entirely? What's the new law being proposed?
Why the NDA’s win in Bihar elections matter beyond Patna
Why this Bihar candidate won't be able to remove her mask after election results
Made in China: Why Nepal has switched from India to China to print its currency
Hitler likely suffered from a genetic disorder: What is Kallman Syndrome?
What is Threema, the Swiss messaging app that helped Delhi blast accused?
Bihar elections prove Modi's popularity in Hindi heartland, send global message
item.description: This decisive Bihar victory reinforces the NDA’s legitimacy and national standing

item.title: Khawaja Asif’s ‘two-front’ delusion: Why Pakistan keeps provoking Bharat — even after repeated defeats
item.description: The ‘Medina mindset’ makes Islamabad a perpetual adversary of Bharat, driven by the belief that simply retaining the ability to challenge New Delhi is itself victory

item.title: Delhi blast cautions India about internal-external terror nexus
item.description: For any nation, homegrown terrorism is amongst the most serious threats, especially if it is supported and backed by a foreign adversary

item.title: How President Murmu’s Botswana visit heralds a shared India-Africa future
item.description: As both countries prepare to celebrate 60 years of diplomatic ties in 2026, their collaboration is poised to evolve into a model of South-South partnership—one that combines India’s developmental experience and Botswana’s governance excellence

item.title: PM Modi’s Thimphu outreach: Three pillars of Indo-Bhutanese friendship amid Chinese assertiveness
item.description: India’s renewed commitment to Bhutan signals a critical recalibration of regional power dynamics and a reminder of why New Delhi’s smaller neighbour must look southward rather than northward for its security and prosperity

item.title: Rich kid socialism or rising progressive force? The case of Zohran Mamdani
item.description: The future of Mamdani’s experiment depends on whether he can convert generational energy into institutional outcomes
